mapper.sql: DECLARE @today Date SET @today = GETDATE() SELECT c.*, me.codeName paymentMethodName, b.codeName bankName, do.name donationPurposeName, co.name corporateName, org.codeName organizationName, CASE WHEN @today < startDate THEN '시작전' WHEN @today >= endDate THEN '종료' ELSE '진행' END [state], datediff(MM, startDate, ISNULL(endDate, GETDATE())) months FROM Commitment c LEFT JOIN [Code] me ON me.id = c.paymentMethodId LEFT JOIN [Code] b ON b.id = c.bankId LEFT JOIN DonationPurpose do ON do.id = c.donationPurposeId LEFT JOIN Corporate co ON co.id = do.corporateId LEFT JOIN [Code] org ON org.id = do.organizationId
mapper.select: WHERE c.paymentMethodId = #{paymentMethodId} AND c.id IN (SELECT id FROM commitment WHERE sponsorId = #{sponsorNo})
WHERE c.id IN (SELECT id FROM commitment WHERE sponsorId = #{sponsorNo})

DECLARE @n INT SET @n = ISNULL(( SELECT MAX(CONVERT(INT, RIGHT(commitmentNo, 2),0)) FROM commitment WHERE sponsorId = #{sponsorId}), 0) + 1 SELECT sponsorNo + '-' + REPLACE(STR(@n,2), ' ', '0') FROM sponsor WHERE id = #{sponsorId}
mapper.insert: INSERT Commitment (sponsorId, commitmentNo, donationPurposeId, paymentMethodId, commitmentDate, startDate, endDate, amountPerMonth, paymentDay, bankId, accountNo, accountHolder, birthDate, etc) VALUES (#{sponsorId}, #{commitmentNo}, #{donationPurposeId}, #{paymentMethodId}, CONVERT(DATE, IIF(LEN(RTRIM(#{commitmentDate})) < 10, null, #{commitmentDate})), CONVERT(DATE, IIF(LEN(RTRIM(#{startDate})) < 10, null, #{startDate})), CONVERT(DATE, IIF(LEN(RTRIM(#{endDate})) < 10, null, #{endDate})), #{amountPerMonth}, #{paymentDay}, #{bankId}, #{accountNo}, #{accountHolder}, RTRIM(#{birthDate}), #{etc})
mapper.update: UPDATE Commitment SET donationPurposeId = #{donationPurposeId}, paymentMethodId = #{paymentMethodId}, commitmentDate = CONVERT(DATE, IIF(LEN(RTRIM(#{commitmentDate})) < 10, null, #{commitmentDate})), startDate = CONVERT(DATE, IIF(LEN(RTRIM(#{startDate})) < 10, null, #{startDate})), endDate = CONVERT(DATE, IIF(LEN(RTRIM(#{endDate})) < 10, null, #{endDate})), amountPerMonth = #{amountPerMonth}, paymentDay = #{paymentDay}, etc = #{etc} WHERE id = #{id}
mapper.select: SELECT c.*, s.sponsorNo, s.name, b.codeName bankName, b.etc1 bankCode FROM commitment c JOIN sponsor s ON c.sponsorId = s.id JOIN [code] b ON c.bankId = b.id WHERE c.paymentMethodId = 10 AND (eb13State IS NULL OR eb13State = '에러') ORDER BY c.commitmentDate DESC

SELECT c.*, s.sponsorNo, s.name, b.codeName bankName, b.etc1 bankCode FROM commitment c JOIN sponsor s ON c.sponsorId = s.id JOIN [code] b ON c.bankId = b.id WHERE c.paymentMethodId = 10 AND eb13State = '성공' AND (endDate IS NULL OR endDate <= #{paymentDate}) AND paymentDay = #{paymentDay} ORDER BY c.commitmentDate DESC

SELECT c.*, s.sponsorNo, s.name, b.codeName bankName, b.etc1 bankCode, e.description eb13errorCodeMsg, CONVERT(VARCHAR, DECRYPTBYPASSPHRASE(CONVERT(VARCHAR, ${key1}), juminNo_encrypted)) juminNo FROM commitment c JOIN sponsor s ON c.sponsorId = s.id JOIN [code] b ON c.bankId = b.id LEFT JOIN cmsErrorCode e ON e.code = c.eb13ErrorCode WHERE c.paymentMethodId = 10 AND ((#{state} = 'all') OR (#{state} = 'null' AND eb13State IS NULL) OR (#{state} = eb13State)) AND (eb13Date BETWEEN #{startDt} AND #{endDt}) ORDER BY c.commitmentDate DESC
